text: Antonina is a genus of mealybugs in the family Pseudococcidae. There are at least three described species in Antonina. ==Species== * Antonina crawii Cockerell, 1900 * Antonina graminis (Maskell, 1897) * Antonina pretiosa Ferris, 1953 (noxious bamboo mealybug) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Sternorrhyncha genera Category:Pseudococcidae
title: Antonina (genus)
